title: Opinion: Francis Collins: ‘I think of science as glimpsing God’s mind’
description: Watching Christians reject vaccines has “been heartbreaking,” says former NIH Director Francis Collins.
content: Watching Christians reject vaccines has “been heartbreaking,” says former NIH Director Francis Collins.
